channel.title: In need of a logo please =)
channel.description:
Ok, I am in need of a new logo to go with my site lol
The name is SAMMS (Ski Area Maininance Managment Services) Its a registered buisness
Ok it needs to do with ski area's or mountains in someway, cant look really childish, or be too uber (has to look somewhat corperate)
The color scheme needs to follow the folowing colors:
Blue,Red,Black, and White
If anyone has free time and could possibly do this I WOULD LOVE U! You would probably save me anywhere from 100-400$ to get a professional to do it :/
Here is something i came up with just for insperation lol

item.title: In need of a logo please =)

item.description:
@MoO wrote:

Site url is www.samms.ca but this wont help much as I am implementing a new site in the next 4-7 days
